projects.title: FlyAway Virtual Flight School
projects.description:
FlyAway was a Discord community that aimed to help new Simulator Pilots learn how to fly realistically. I designed and developed the Discord bot and website for the community. The site and bot worked together via API that made them communicate user information and functions. It was a very complex system, but it gave me lot's of coding, backend, frontend, github, and other valuable knowledge moving forward. 

The site is using Node.js, ejs extension, extensive API, and hosted using Nginx to flyawayvirtual.com.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: I have designed and produced my own personal portfolio you are currently reading. This gave me development and designing experience valuable for the future.

projects.title: VATRAIN
projects.description: VATRAIN was an aviation community discontinued in 2023. I designed a basic website using WIX and used zapier for a basic system.

projects.title: San Juan CERAP Webmaster Projects
projects.description: As the San Juan CERAP's Webmaster on the VATSIM Network for Aviation Enthusiasts I have Designed Discord/Web applications for the community. All coding. Very good learning experience.
